Text:
This torrent is spam. It's 4 pages of the most obvious stuff with plugs trying to get you to visit two sex-oriented web sites. Avoid downloading it. About half the items on this site for dating are spam. 

Please notify others via comments if this is the case to save everyone time and effort, and to discourage spammers from trying it. Also delete them from your downloads so you don't become a seeder of them.
